posts.content:
Hi All
I have a mid 65 bus that someone has ripped the wiring loom out of. Was wondering if anybody has an old one they have replaced that I can buy to just get my bus going. Incomplete or in bits is fine as in just trying to get the project driving for as cheap as possible at the moment. Could collect at One big Sunday or busfest if that suits you.

Thanks in advance Paul

That's never a good idea Paul, I build them from new.


Ron
